name: Skyfarm
storyline:
Skyfarm takes place ten years after a devastating flood submerged much of the city. With the city and surrounding farmland lost to the water, survivors turned to rooftop gardens—Skyfarms—as a means of survival and a last hope for biodiversity. You play as a new Skyfarmer, working tirelessly to cultivate crops and sustain the community in the building below. In return, you receive localCoin, which can be used to upgrade your garden.
Your rooftop is a sanctuary amidst a decaying megacity, where you’ll establish ecosystems, regenerate soil, and expand your garden. Form relationships with fellow Skyfarmers, navigate weather challenges, and care for a loyal cat companion. Every day brings new tasks and opportunities as you strive to create a resilient and productive garden, with the ultimate goal of earning your citizenship in the society below.
summary: Skyfarm is a cozy single-player 3D farming simulation game, set on a post-apocalyptic rooftop and based on permaculture principles. Tend to your garden and create self-regulating ecosystems to harvest food and increase biodiversity. Talk to fellow rooftop gardeners and unlock new elements.
